org.jerkar.api.depmanagement
Class JkMavenPublicationInfo

java.lang.Object
  org.jerkar.api.depmanagement.JkMavenPublicationInfo
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public final class JkMavenPublicationInfo
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

These are extra information required to publish on Maven central.

See Also:
